20110125180655.000|20110125180656.000|CC1|CONTRASTING VISION, I MIGHT ADD,
20110125180656.000|20110125180659.000|CC1|FROM REPUBLICANS.               
20110125180659.000|20110125180700.000|CC1|>> SHERYL, THANK YOU VERY MUCH.

20110125180702.000|20110125180703.000|CC1|LATER.
